data.lyric:
[ti:All Falls Down]
[ar:Alan Walker/Noah Cyrus/Digital Farm Animals/Juliander]
[al:All Falls Down]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]All Falls Down (全部倒塌) - Alan Walker (艾兰·沃克)/Noah Cyrus/Digital Farm Animals/Juliander
[00:00.14]Lyrics by：Pablo Bowman/Rick Boardman/Sarah Blanchard/Daniel Boyle/Nicholas Gale
[00:00.28]Composed by：Alan Walker/Anders Frøen/Pablo Bowman/Rick Boardman/Sarah Blanchard/Nicholas Gale
[00:00.43]Noah Cyrus：
[00:00.45]What's the trick
[00:01.46]I wish I knew
[00:03.03]I'm so done with thinking through
[00:05.29]All the things I could've been
[00:07.98]And I know you wonder too
[00:10.33]All it takes is that one look you do
[00:12.94]And I run right back to you
[00:15.09]You crossed the line and it's time to say "F you"
[00:20.03]What's the point in saying that
[00:22.66]When you know how I'll react
[00:24.77]You think you can just take it back
[00:27.54]But s**t just don't work like that
[00:29.76]You're the d**g that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[00:34.66]Guess I'm stuck with you and that's that
[00:39.32]'Cause when it all falls down then whatever
[00:44.47]When it don't work out for the better
[00:49.39]If it just ain't right and it's time to say goodbye
[00:54.22]When it all falls down when it all falls down
[00:59.16]I'll be fine
[01:04.13]I'll be fine
[01:08.90]You're the d**g that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[01:13.59]But I'll be fine
[01:17.12]Juliander/Noah Cyrus：
[01:18.86]Why we fight
[01:20.09]I don't know
[01:21.56]We say what hurts the most
[01:23.62]Oh I try staying cold but you take it personal
[01:28.56]All these firing shots and making ground
[01:31.42]It's way too hard to cope but I still can't let you go
[01:36.95]Noah Cyrus/Juliander：
[01:38.03]'Cause when it all falls down then whatever
[01:43.17]When it don't work out for the better
[01:48.10]If it just ain't right and it's time to say goodbye
[01:52.99]When it all falls down when it all falls down
[01:57.91]I'll be fine
[02:02.82]I'll be fine
[02:07.75]You're the d**g that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[02:12.41]But I'll be fine
[02:17.62]I'll be fine-ine-fine fine-ine-ine
[02:20.60]All falls down falling down
[02:22.32]I'll be fine-ine-fine fine-ine-ine
[02:25.51]All falls down
[02:27.24]I'll be fine-ine-fine fine-ine-ine
[02:30.42]All falls down falling down
[02:32.11]I'll be fine-ine-fine fine
[02:34.85]All falls down
[02:36.79]'Cause when it all falls down then whatever
[02:40.83]Then whatever babe
[02:42.03]When it don't work out for the better
[02:45.91]For the better
[02:46.84]If it just ain't right and it's time to say goodbye
[02:51.81]When it all falls down
[02:53.18]When it all when it all
[02:54.51]When it all falls down
[02:55.74]When it all falls down
[02:56.67]I'll be fine
[03:00.15]Fine fine fine
[03:01.63]I'll be fine
[03:02.71]I'll be fine
[03:06.57]You're the d**g that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[03:11.14]But I'll be fine
[03:12.61]I'll be fine
[03:13.93]And that's that
data.trans:
[ti:All Falls Down]
[ar:Alan Walker/Noah Cyrus/Digital Farm Animals/Juliander]
[al:All Falls Down]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.28]//
[00:00.43]//
[00:00.45]爱的诀窍是什么 
[00:01.46]多希望我能知道
[00:03.03]我受够了总是去想
[00:05.29]我所经历的一切
[00:07.98]我知道你也渴望着我
[00:10.33]一切源于你的一个眼神
[00:12.94]我又回到你的身边
[00:15.09]但你仍不思悔改 现在是时候说 该死的 
[00:20.03]即便你知道我会作何反应
[00:22.66]说那些又有何意义
[00:24.77]你以为你能重回曾经美好
[00:27.54]但该死的 现实就是不能如愿
[00:29.76]你如让我欲罢不能的毒药般 我对你的渴望如此强烈
[00:34.66]我想 对你我早已无法抗拒 事实就是这样
[00:39.32]因为当一切支离破碎 也就无所谓了
[00:44.47]当一切都愈来愈糟 
[00:49.39]如果我们无法重回正轨 那么是时候说再见
[00:54.22]当一切支离破碎
[00:59.16]我会好起来的
[01:04.13]我会好起来的
[01:08.90]你如让我欲罢不能的毒药般 我对你的渴望如此强烈
[01:13.59]但我会好起来的
[01:17.12]//
[01:18.86]我不知道我们
[01:20.09]为何争吵不休
[01:21.56]我们都说了伤害彼此的话
[01:23.62]我试图保持冷静但你总是针对我
[01:28.56]情况愈演愈烈终究发展到无可挽回的境地
[01:31.42]我们陷入困境 无法逃离 但我仍不愿就此放手
[01:36.95]//
[01:38.03]因为当一切支离破碎 也就无所谓了
[01:43.17]当一切都愈来愈糟 
[01:48.10]如果我们无法重回正轨 那么是时候说再见
[01:52.99]当一切支离破碎
[01:57.91]我会好起来的
[02:02.82]我会好起来的
[02:07.75]你如让我欲罢不能的毒药般 我对你的渴望如此强烈
[02:12.41]但我会好起来的
[02:17.62]我会好起来的
[02:20.60]一切支离破碎
[02:22.32]我会好起来的
[02:25.51]一切支离破碎
[02:27.24]我会好起来的
[02:30.42]一切支离破碎
[02:32.11]我会好起来的
[02:34.85]一切支离破碎
[02:36.79]因为当一切支离破碎 也就无所谓了
[02:40.83]也就无所谓了宝贝
[02:42.03]当一切都愈来愈糟 
[02:45.91]愈来愈糟 
[02:46.84]如果我们无法重回正轨 那么是时候说再见
[02:51.81]当一切支离破碎时
[02:53.18]当一切支离破碎时
[02:54.51]当一切支离破碎时
[02:55.74]当一切支离破碎时
[02:56.67]我会好起来的
[03:00.15]好起来的
[03:01.63]我会好起来的
[03:02.71]我会好起来的
[03:06.57]你如让我欲罢不能的毒药般 我对你的渴望如此强烈
[03:11.14]但我会好起来的
[03:12.61]我会好起来的
[03:13.93]事实就是这样
